feels.name: Amusement
feels.quote: Scrap, whenever she looked at Mr. Wilkins, saw him in his towel, dripping water, and felt indulgent.

feels.name: Indulgence
feels.quote: Scrap, whenever she looked at Mr. Wilkins, saw him in his towel, dripping water, and felt indulgent.

feels.name: Placation
feels.quote: What Mr. Wilkins said to her in reply, when reminded by what she was saying of his condition, was so handsome in its apology, so proper in its confusion, that she had ended by being quite sorry for him and completely placated.

feels.name: Admiration
feels.quote: Mrs. Fisher was delighted with him.

feels.name: Approval
feels.quote: Meanwhile Lady Caroline was all and more than all Mr. Wilkins had imagined, and had received his speeches, worked in skilfully between the courses, graciously.

feels.name: Delight
feels.quote: Her face sparkled with delight at the instantaneous effect of San Salvatore.

Places.name: Dining_room
Places.description: Where the characters interacted with Mr. Wilkins.
